entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , La Scie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:15 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Scie 2:30 PM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near noon. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 early this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 15 this morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy. Flurries beginning overnight. Risk of snow squalls overnight. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 this evening then southwest 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries or snow squalls. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Flurries or snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 near noon. High minus 14. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023
